    • Method Detail

      • addCell

        void addCell(java.lang.Object data)
        Adds a cell containing a string representation of the given data to the last row of this table. The string representation of the data is created using the toString() method.
        Parameters:
        data - The data whose string representation shall be contained by the cell.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If the newRow method hasn't been called.
